verses.verse: Now it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass on a day, <S%H3117><s%> that Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the young <S%H5288><s%> man that bore <S%H5375><s%> his armor, <S%H3627><s%> Come, <S%H3212><s%> and let us go <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> to the Philistines' <S%H6430><s%> garrison, <S%H4673><s%> that is on the other <S%H5676><s%> side. <S%H5676><s%> But he told <S%H5046><s%> not his father. <S%H1><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> tarried <S%H3427><s%> in the uttermost <S%H7097><s%> part of Gibeah <S%H1390><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> a pomegranate <S%H7416><s%> tree which <S%H834><s%> is in Migron: <S%H4051><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> that were with him were about six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men; <S%H376><s%>

And Ahiah, <S%H281><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahitub, <S%H285><s%> Ichabod's <S%H350><s%> brother, <S%H251><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Phinehas, <S%H6372><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eli, <S%H5941><s%> the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> in Shiloh, <S%H7887><s%> wearing <S%H5375><s%> an ephod. <S%H646><s%> And the people <S%H5971><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> not that Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> was gone. <S%H1980><s%>

And between <S%H996><s%> the passages, <S%H4569><s%> by which <S%H834><s%> Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> sought <S%H1245><s%> to go <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> to the Philistines' <S%H6430><s%> garrison, <S%H4673><s%> there was a sharp <S%H8127><s%> rock <S%H5553><s%> on the one <S%H2088><s%> side, <S%H5676><s%> and a sharp <S%H8127><s%> rock <S%H5553><s%> on the other <S%H2088><s%> side: <S%H5676><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> was Bozez, <S%H949><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the other <S%H259><s%> Seneh. <S%H5573><s%>

The forefront <S%H8127><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> was situate <S%H4690><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%> over <S%H4136><s%> against <S%H4136><s%> Michmash, <S%H4363><s%> and the other <S%H259><s%> southward <S%H5045><s%> over <S%H4136><s%> against <S%H4136><s%> Gibeah. <S%H1390><s%>

And Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the young <S%H5288><s%> man that bore <S%H5375><s%> his armor, <S%H3627><s%> Come, <S%H3212><s%> and let us go <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> to the garrison <S%H4673><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> uncircumcised: <S%H6189><s%> it may be that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will work <S%H6213><s%> for us: for there is no <S%H369><s%> restraint <S%H4622><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> by many <S%H7227><s%> or <S%H176><s%> by few. <S%H4592><s%>

And his armor bearer <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3627><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, Do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that is in your heart: <S%H3824><s%> turn <S%H5186><s%> you; behold, <S%H2005><s%> I am with you according to your heart. <S%H3824><s%>
Then said <S%H559><s%> Jonathan, <S%H3083><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> we will pass <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> to these men, <S%H582><s%> and we will discover <S%H1540><s%> ourselves to them.

If <S%H518><s%> they say <S%H559><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> to us, Tarry <S%H1826><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> we come <S%H5060><s%> to you; then we will stand <S%H5975><s%> still in our place, <S%H8478><s%> and will not go <S%H5927><s%> up to them.

But if <S%H518><s%> they say <S%H559><s%> thus, <S%H3541><s%> Come <S%H5927><s%> up to us; then we will go <S%H5927><s%> up: for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into our hand: <S%H3027><s%> and this <S%H2088><s%> shall be a sign <S%H226><s%> to us.

And both of them discovered <S%H1540><s%> themselves to the garrison <S%H4673><s%> of the Philistines: <S%H6430><s%> and the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the Hebrews <S%H5680><s%> come <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the holes <S%H2356><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> they had hid <S%H2244><s%> themselves.

And the men <S%H582><s%> of the garrison <S%H4675><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> and his armor bearer, <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3627><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Come <S%H5927><s%> up to us, and we will show <S%H3045><s%> you a thing. <S%H1697><s%> And Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his armor bearer, <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3627><s%> Come <S%H5927><s%> up after <S%H310><s%> me: for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> climbed <S%H5927><s%> up on his hands <S%H3027><s%> and on his feet, <S%H7272><s%> and his armor bearer <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3627><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him: and they fell <S%H5307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jonathan; <S%H3129><s%> and his armor bearer <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3627><s%> slew <S%H4191><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him.

And that first <S%H7223><s%> slaughter, <S%H4347><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> and his armor bearer <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3627><s%> made, <S%H5221><s%> was about twenty <S%H6242><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> within as it were an half <S%H2677><s%> acre <S%H4618><s%> of land, <S%H7704><s%> which a yoke <S%H6776><s%> of oxen might plow.

And there was trembling <S%H2731><s%> in the host, <S%H4264><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> and among all <S%H3605><s%> the people: <S%H5971><s%> the garrison, <S%H4673><s%> and the spoilers, <S%H7843><s%> they also <S%H1571><s%> trembled, <S%H2729><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> quaked: <S%H7264><s%> so it was a very <S%H430><s%> great <S%H430><s%> trembling. <S%H2731><s%>

And the watchmen <S%H6822><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> in Gibeah <S%H1390><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> looked; <S%H7200><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the multitude <S%H1995><s%> melted <S%H4127><s%> away, and they went <S%H3212><s%> on beating <S%H1986><s%> down one another.

Then said <S%H559><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> that were with him, Number <S%H6485><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> is gone <S%H1980><s%> from us. And when they had numbered, <S%H6485><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> and his armor bearer <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3627><s%> were not there.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Ahiah, <S%H281><s%> Bring <S%H5066><s%> here <S%H5066><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%> For the ark <S%H727><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> was at that time <S%H3117><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, while <S%H5704><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> talked <S%H1696><s%> to the priest, <S%H3548><s%> that the noise <S%H1995><s%> that was in the host <S%H4264><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> on and increased: <S%H7227><s%> and Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the priest, <S%H3548><s%> Withdraw <S%H622><s%> your hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that were with him assembled <S%H2199><s%> themselves, and they came <S%H935><s%> to the battle: <S%H4421><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> every man's <S%H376><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%> was against his fellow, <S%H7453><s%> and there was a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> discomfiture. <S%H4103><s%>

Moreover the Hebrews <S%H5680><s%> that were with the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> before <S%H865><s%> that time, <S%H8032><s%> which <S%H834><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up with them into the camp <S%H4264><s%> from the country round <S%H5439><s%> about, even they also <S%H1571><s%> turned <S%H6437><s%> to be with the Israelites <S%H3478><s%> that were with Saul <S%H7586><s%> and Jonathan. <S%H3129><s%>

Likewise all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> which had hid <S%H2244><s%> themselves in mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> when they heard <S%H8085><s%> that the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> fled, <S%H5127><s%> even they also <S%H1571><s%> followed <S%H1692><s%> hard <S%H1692><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them in the battle. <S%H4421><s%>
So the LORD <S%H3068><s%> saved <S%H3467><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> that day: <S%H3117><s%> and the battle <S%H4421><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> to Bethaven. <S%H1007><s%>

And the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were distressed <S%H5065><s%> that day: <S%H3117><s%> for Saul <S%H7586><s%> had adjured <S%H422><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Cursed <S%H779><s%> be the man <S%H376><s%> that eats <S%H398><s%> any food <S%H3899><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> evening, <S%H6153><s%> that I may be avenged <S%H5358><s%> on my enemies. <S%H341><s%> So none <S%H3808><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> tasted <S%H2938><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> food. <S%H3899><s%>
And all <S%H3605><s%> they of the land <S%H776><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to a wood; <S%H3293><s%> and there was honey <S%H1706><s%> on the ground. <S%H7704><s%>

And when the people <S%H5971><s%> were come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the wood, <S%H3293><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the honey <S%H1706><s%> dropped; <S%H1982><s%> but no <S%H369><s%> man put <S%H5381><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> to his mouth: <S%H6310><s%> for the people <S%H5971><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%> the oath. <S%H7621><s%>

But Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> not when his father <S%H1><s%> charged <S%H7650><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> with the oath: <S%H7650><s%> why he put <S%H7971><s%> forth <S%H7971><s%> the end <S%H7097><s%> of the rod <S%H4294><s%> that was in his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and dipped <S%H2881><s%> it in an honeycomb, <S%H3295><s%> <S%H1706><s%> and put <S%H7725><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> to his mouth; <S%H6310><s%> and his eyes <S%H5869><s%> were enlightened. <S%H215><s%>

Then answered <S%H6030><s%> one of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Your father <S%H1><s%> straightly charged <S%H7650><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> with an oath, <S%H7650><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Cursed <S%H779><s%> be the man <S%H376><s%> that eats <S%H398><s%> any food <S%H3899><s%> this day. <S%H3117><s%> And the people <S%H5971><s%> were faint. <S%H5774><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> Jonathan, <S%H3129><s%> My father <S%H1><s%> has troubled <S%H5916><s%> the land: <S%H776><s%> see, <S%H7200><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, how <S%H3588><s%> my eyes <S%H5869><s%> have been enlightened, <S%H215><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> I tasted <S%H2938><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> honey. <S%H1706><s%>

How <S%H637><s%> much <S%H637><s%> more, <S%H637><s%> if <S%H3863><s%> haply <S%H3863><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> had eaten <S%H398><s%> freely to day <S%H3117><s%> of the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they found? <S%H4672><s%> for had there not been now <S%H6258><s%> a much greater <S%H7235><s%> slaughter <S%H4347><s%> among the Philistines? <S%H6430><s%>

And they smote <S%H5221><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> from Michmash <S%H4363><s%> to Aijalon: <S%H357><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> were very <S%H3966><s%> faint. <S%H5774><s%>

And the people <S%H5971><s%> flew <S%H6213><s%> on the spoil, <S%H7998><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> sheep, <S%H6629><s%> and oxen, <S%H1241><s%> and calves, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1242><s%> and slew <S%H7819><s%> them on the ground: <S%H776><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> did eat <S%H398><s%> them with the blood. <S%H1818><s%>

Then they told <S%H5046><s%> Saul, <S%H7586><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> sin <S%H2398><s%> against the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> in that they eat <S%H398><s%> with the blood. <S%H1818><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> You have transgressed: <S%H898><s%> roll <S%H1556><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> to me this day. <S%H3117><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Disperse <S%H6327><s%> yourselves among the people, <S%H5971><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, Bring <S%H5066><s%> me here <S%H5066><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his ox, <S%H7794><s%> and every man <S%H376><s%> his sheep, <S%H7716><s%> and slay <S%H7819><s%> them here, <S%H2088><s%> and eat; <S%H398><s%> and sin <S%H2398><s%> not against the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in eating <S%H398><s%> with the blood. <S%H1818><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> brought <S%H5066><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his ox <S%H7794><s%> with him that night, <S%H3915><s%> and slew <S%H7819><s%> them there. <S%H8033><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> the same was the first <S%H2490><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> that he built <S%H1129><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Let us go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> by night, <S%H3915><s%> and spoil <S%H962><s%> them until <S%H5704><s%> the morning <S%H1242><s%> light, <S%H216><s%> and let us not leave <S%H7604><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of them. And they said, <S%H559><s%> Do <S%H6213><s%> whatever <S%H3605><s%> seems <S%H5869><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> to you. Then said <S%H559><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> Let us draw near <S%H7126><s%> here <S%H1988><s%> to God. <S%H430><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> asked <S%H7592><s%> counsel of God, <S%H430><s%> Shall I go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the Philistines? <S%H6430><s%> will you deliver <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Israel? <S%H3478><s%> But he answered <S%H6030><s%> him not that day. <S%H3117><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Draw you near <S%H5066><s%> here, <S%H1988><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the chief <S%H6438><s%> of the people: <S%H5971><s%> and know <S%H3045><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> wherein <S%H4100><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> sin <S%H2403><s%> has been <S%H1961><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

For, as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> lives, <S%H2416><s%> which saves <S%H3467><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> it be in Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> my son, <S%H1121><s%> he shall surely <S%H3588><s%> die. <S%H4191><s%> But there was not a man among all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that answered <S%H6030><s%> him.

Then said <S%H559><s%> he to all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Be you on one <S%H259><s%> side, <S%H5676><s%> and I and Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> my son <S%H1121><s%> will be on the other <S%H259><s%> side. <S%H5676><s%> And the people <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Saul, <S%H7586><s%> Do <S%H6213><s%> what seems <S%H5869><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> to you.

Therefore Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Give <S%H3051><s%> a perfect <S%H8549><s%> lot. And Saul <S%H7586><s%> and Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> were taken: <S%H3920><s%> but the people <S%H5971><s%> escaped. <S%H3318><s%>
And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Cast <S%H5307><s%> lots between <S%H996><s%> me and Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> my son. <S%H1121><s%> And Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> was taken. <S%H3920><s%>

Then Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jonathan, <S%H3129><s%> Tell <S%H5046><s%> me what <S%H4100><s%> you have done. <S%H6213><s%> And Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> him, and said, <S%H559><s%> I did but taste <S%H2938><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> honey <S%H1706><s%> with the end <S%H7097><s%> of the rod <S%H4294><s%> that was in my hand, <S%H3027><s%> and, see, <S%H2114><s%> I must die. <S%H4191><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> answered, <S%H559><s%> God <S%H430><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3541><s%> and more <S%H3254><s%> also: <S%H3541><s%> for you shall surely die, <S%H4191><s%> Jonathan. <S%H3129><s%>
